Gorreti who is single but has one child says she took root in this business with savings from her tailoring business. Monthly she says this business generates profits equivalent to shillings 200,000. With this Kiva loan, she feels she will be empowered to purchase more ripe bananas, jack fruit, pineapples, etc. to resell.

loans.use: to purchase more ripe bananas, jack fruit, pineapples, etc. to resell.

loans.name: Julia

texts.pt:
nasceu na Provincia de Inhambane, Sul de Moçambique, tem 49 anos de idade é solteira mãe de 6 filhos  dos 14 aos 29 anos 3 é que vão a Escola os restantes estão nos seus lares. Faz a 7ª classe não conclui devido a falta de condições, vive na casa dos pais e responsabiliza se por eles.

vivia na Provincia de Sofala centro de Moçambique onde tinha sua própria casa. mas seu marido vende a casa sem o consetimento dela e é disalojada, tendo assim que voltar a casa dos pais onde consegue aranjar um emprego no Colégio Maria Auxiliadora ( Namaacha) como servente. Trabalha ha 17 anos das 6h as 14h auferindo 2.400.00mt que aplica nas dispesas da casa, mas conta com ajuda das suas filhas que envam lhe 1.000.00mt mensalmente.

Este é seu terceiro empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 12.000.00mt com o qual pretende iniciar com a nova obra pois onde iniciara com o primeiro emprestimo de 6.000.00mt ficava distante do seu trabalho, posteriormente legaliza um outro terreno que esta proximo do trabalho e da vila. Nunca trabalhou com outros Bancos e esta confiante que vai reembolsar antes do tempo.
texts.en:
She was born in the Inhambane province,  in southern Mozambique.  She is 49 years old and the single mother of 6 children ages 14 to 29 years old.  Three of the children are going to school the rest are in their own homes. She went to school until 7th grade, which she did not complete, due to lack of logistical conditions. She lives in her parents home and is also responsible for them.

She lived in the province of Sofala, in central Mozambique, where she had her own home, but her husband sold the house without her consent.  She was homeless and had to return to her parents home, where she was able to get a job at the “Saint Mary Christian School”, in Namaacha city, as an assistant. She has worked for 17 years from 6:00 AM to 2:00 PM earning 2.400.00mt, which she applies to household expenses, but she does get help from her daughters who will send her 1.000.00mt monthly.

This is her third loan with the Hluvuku [field partner loan agency] in the amount of 12.000.00mt.  With this loan, she hopes to start a new project continuing what she started with the first 6.000.00mt loan, which was far from her work so she hopes to get legal access to another parcel of land to work within her village.  She has never worked with other banks, and is confident she will repay the loan ahead of time.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Adrienne

texts.fr:
Femme de 48ans, célibataire et mère de 2 enfants dont l’âge varie entre 23ans et 18ans .Elle a commencée en 1978 à vendre les patates douces grillées devant la parcelle de ses parents avec 2500f de fond. Avec la réalité du pays, elle s’est lancé dans le commerce des habits en 2002 et ouvre une boutique avec étalage à la devanture. 

Par jour elle a des recettes de 25.000f minimum et 100.000f maximum, ce troisième prêt va lui permettre d’acheter dans les dépôts de la place deux ballot de tee-shirts, un ballot des pantalons jeans pour enfants, 10 douzaines des chemises mixtes, 5 douzaines des robes pour fillettes, 5 douzaines de culottes pour petits garçons, 10 douzaines  d’ensembles des sous vêtements pour dames ainsi que des sacs à main pour dames.

Elle à pour vision de faire plus de bénéfices et commencer dans la vente en gros, elle est seule à subvenir aux besoins des ses filles, car elle les soutiens dans leurs études ainsi que construire une maison pour ses enfants.
texts.en:
A 48-year old woman, single and the mother of two (23 and 18 years of age). Back in 1978, she started selling grilled sweet potatoes in front of her parents’ home, with 2500 West African Francs as a starting capital. In view of the developments in her country, in 2002 she went into selling clothes and opened a shop with a stand in front of  her entrance.

Her daily receipts range between 25,000 and 100,000 francs. This third loan will allow her to buy from local wholesalers two bales of t-shirts, one bale of children’s jeans, 10 dozens of various shirts, five dozens of young girl’s dresses, 5 dozens of  boys’ pants, 10 dozens of ladies’ underwear sets as well as ladies’ handbags. Her vision is to increase her income and to start selling wholesale. She is the only one to support her daughters, whom she supports in their studies. She would also like to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase bales of T-shirts,  girls' dresses, various shirts etc

loans.name: Jalal

texts.en:
Jalal is married and has two children that he is very proud of since they are struggling to get ahead. He started a business of processing and selling food and vegetables 7 years ago. He is experienced in this kind of business and that allows him to expand his clientele day by day.

Right now Jalal requests 1,000 AZN for purchasing more food to further process and to sell. With your help, Jalal will be able to feel proud that through much effort, his children went to college and became honorable people.

loans.use: to purchase more food merchandise to increase stock

loans.name: Taleh

texts.ru:
Taleh ne jenat i ne imeyet detey. Etot molodoy chelovek yavlyayetsya IDP personom pereselenec iz Djabrail regiona, seychas projivayet v Absheron regione vmeste so svoimi roditelyami. Taleh 24 qoda.
Uje 3 qoda kak on zanimayetsya prodajey diskov kaset i t.d. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi rasshirit pomesheniye svoyego magazina dlya razmesheniya bolshe tovara.
texts.en:
Taleh is single and has no children.  This young man is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person).  He is a refugee from the Djabrail region who now lives in the Absheron region with his parents.  Taleh is 24 years old.

For three years, he has sold disks, cassettes, etc.  Now he needs 2000 AZN to expand his shop in order to hold more of his wares.

loans.use: to expand his shop.

loans.name: Marta

texts.pt:
nasceu no Distrito de Namacha, Provincia de Maputo tem 42 anos de idade é mãe de 3 filhos de 7 aos 20 anos , todos vão a Escola. Fez a 6ª classe não concluiu devido a distância que a separava da Escola a casa. Vive com sua familia na casa propria e reponsabiliza se pela sua mãe enviando lhe 1.000.00mt por mês.

é proprietaria de um tractor que faz trabalhos de lavoura e colheita local, consegue colectar um fundo e da inicio do seu próprio negócio. Hoje é dona também de um estabelecimento comercial  na zona fronteiriça, conta com ajuda de 2 empregados que auferem 1.500.00mt cada consegue de lucro um valor de 6.000.00mt que aplica nas dispesas da casa. Conta com ajuda do seu marido que e proprietária e criador de 32 cabeças de gado bovino.

Este é o quarto empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 25.000.00mt com o qual pretende comprar material de construção para reabilitação da sua capoeira pois pretende iniciar com a criação de pintos aumentando assim a renda familiar. Os anteriores de (10.000.00, 20.000.00, 20.000.00)mt foram para o comércio

Esta confiante que ira pagar antes do tempo e pedir novos créditos para compra de pintos de criação.
texts.en:
Marta was born in the district of Namaacha in Maputo province. She is 42 years old and the mother of three children between 7 and 20 years of age. All of her children attend school. She went to school through the sixth grade but couldn't finish because her school was too far away. She and her family live in their own home, and she also supports her mother, sending her 1000 meticals a month.
She owns a tractor that she uses to do plowing and harvesting locally, which has allowed her to save up enough money to open her own business. Today she is also the owner of a retail establishment with two employees who earn 1500 meticals. The business provides profits of 6000 meticals a month, which she uses to cover household expenses. Her husband also contributes financially; he raises cows and currently owns 32 head of cattle.
This is her fourth loan with Hluvuku, in the amount of 25,000 meticals. She will use it to purchase construction materials to refurbish her chicken coop, since she plans to start raising chickens for a little extra income. Her previous loans (in the amounts of 10,000, 20,000, and 20,000 meticals) were also invested in the business.
She is confident that she will be able to pay off this loan early and request additional loans to purchase chickens.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials for her chicken coop.

loans.name: Seymur

texts.en:
Seymur grows different kinds of fruits and vegetables as well as raises cattle. He is 47 years old and has 2 children. 

Seymur was not happy with his previous job because he received little compensation for his work. So he went back to his village and decided to manage his small farm. In the year 2005, Seymur started managing his farm and raising cattle. He uses his harvest to buy the things his family needs. 

Seymur is asking for a loan of 1,200 AZN. He will use the loan to buy seeds, fertilizer and cattle. The loan will help him increase his yield and improve his standard of living.

loans.use: purchase seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Zedekia

texts.en:
Zedekia is 43 years old, married, and has 5 children, ages 10 to 22. He runs a carpentry business with 2 employees and has been working in this business for 10 years. Zedekia plans to use the loan to purchase more timber and a machine to help shorten timber. 

In the future, Zedekia hopes to expand his business even further. He also hopes to develop a plot of land and build rental houses. Zedekia describes himself as visionary.

loans.use: to purchase more timber and a machine to help shorten timber

loans.name: David

texts.en: David is 44 years old, married and the father of five children. For the last three years, he has made a living by running a successful nursery school in Utange, Mombasa. He has been a KADET client for some time and is applying for his second loan, which he will use to buy sheets of iron to renovate his school. He plans to use the additional profits he earns to repay this loan and gradually expand his business. In the future, David hopes to own and run an institute of higher education.

loans.use: to buy sheets of iron to renovate his school.

loans.name: Sanaa

texts.en:
Sanaa is a 44-year-old housewife and a mother of five. Her husband sells car parts.

Sanaa started 10 years ago buying blankets and cloth from the wholesale market and selling the items as her retail business at home. People prefer to buy from her because of the product quality that she provides, and her reasonable prices.

Now Sanaa is applying for a loan to buy a larger quantity of blankets and cloth in order to open her own store in the near future.

loans.use: To buy a larger quantity of blankets and cloth.

loans.name: Qakhraman

texts.en: Qakhraman is a responsible father and loving husband. While young, he learned the honorable work of raising livestock from his parents and that is how he earns a living today. Thanks to his valuable knowledge of livestock, he has been able to obtain good results from his business. This enterprising gentleman’s wish is to invest more capital in young animals. He hopes to continue his dedication to his work, and believes that by improving his stock and feed, his cattle will bring better prices. Three previous loans from AqroInvest helped Qakhraman to build his business step by step and reap success from each loan. For this reason, he is turning to you for financial support that will permit him to continue developing his business.

loans.use: to buy three calves and fodder for them to eat.

loans.name: Ruben

texts.en: Ruben is 55 years old and lives with his wife in Tsovagyugh village, which is in a part of Armenia known as Sevan. He has two sons, both of whom live in Yerevan, and makes a living as an economist and accountant in the Tsovagyugh village administration. In his free time, he is also engaged in farming and raising cows, calves, pigs and piglets. His wife helps him and they use their income to provide for their family's needs and acquire more animals. Ruben has also recently been able to reconstruct and repair parts of his house. He is applying for his fourth loan from Nor Horizon and second loan from Kiva. He plans to use this loan, for 800,000 AMD, to buy a large amount of fodder for his pigs and cows.

loans.use: to buy a large amount of fodder for his pigs and cows.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more fruit to sell to his customers.

loans.name: Rwenkuba  Bakyara Tukole Group, Rukungiri

texts.en: Ireen leads the Rwenkuba Bakyara Tukole group, Rukungiri. She is 56 years old, married and has four children, one of whom is still in school. For the last seven years, she has made a living by running a retail shop in the Katerera Trading Centre where she sells basic items such as sugar, salt, soap and cooking oil. Most of her customers live nearby. In a typical month, Ireen makes 200,000 UGX, which she has used to pay off a previous loan and expand her shop. She also runs a business on the side raising pigs and owns several rental properties, and all her work has allowed her to dramatically improve her life and her family's. She is determined to educate her children and increase her sales. She is applying for this loan to pay her child's school fees and restock her shop with goods.

loans.use: to pay school fees and restock a store.

loans.name: Sengee

texts.en:
Sengee, age 41, is a professional tractor driver who lives with his wife and children in the outer districts of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. His wife runs a shoe-selling business at a local market and he has three sons who all attend public secondary school. 

He has been operating a taxi business since he moved to Ulaanbaatar in 2003. Although he moved to the city, he has possession of a one-hectare land plot in “Tov” province, Mongolia where he plants daily-consumption vegetables. Besides that, this year he planted potatoes on two hectares of land to earn profit by harvesting and selling the potatoes. 

Sengee is well-experienced in his career, especially in farming, thus he is able to operate this business.  He is requesting a 1,500,000 MNT (Mongolian tugriks) loan to purchase irrigation equipment and fertilizers. He and his wife want their children to become highly educated people and are willing to support them as far as they can.

loans.use: to purchase irrigation equipment and fertilizers

loans.name: Garnik

texts.en:
Garnik is a 56-year-old farmer from Village Dadesh, Samtskhe-Javakheti Region. This part of the country is well known for potato growing and dairy farming. Garnik is married and lives with his wife, 30-year-old son, daughter-in-law and two grandchildren (five and four years old). All the members of the family are involved in agricultural activities, which are the only source of income for the family. 

Garnik heads up the family dairy venture. Milk is used for cheese production, which is sold on the local market. In the spring and summer period cows are fed fresh grass and for fall and winter Garnik supplies hay. He mows with a scythe, which is very time-consuming and hard work.  

Garnik requests a loan for purchasing a mowing machine. It will be used for mowing the grass not only for his dairy farm, but also to sell in his and nearby villages. Sales of hay will bring additional income to the family, allowing them to improve their living conditions and purchasing needed goods for the children. At the same time, it will save Garnik time which he can then spend in the dairy farm.

loans.use: to purchase a mowing machine.

loans.name: Florence

texts.en: Florence is 42 years, married, and has four children. She owns a shop in which she sells different kinds of items including matches, soap, sugar, salt, etc. She has been in this business for the past 15 years and she enjoys her work. This business enables her educate and feed her family. She is requesting a loan to buy more items such as sugar, soap, candles, etc. to sell in her shop.

loans.use: to purchase items for her general store.

loans.name: Devine Touch Group

texts.en:
Hellen (the lady with the black scarf) is 52 years of age and from the city Mutare, the capital of Manicaland province in Zimbabwe. She is married with five children, with one attending school. She also cares for three dependents.

Hellen runs a business selling clothes. The business has been in operation for 20 years. She says the main challenge faced is late payments from clients. Hellen has requested a loan of $250 to buy more t-shirts, blouses and warm-type clothing for winter.

She says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow her to improve the family’s quality of life. In the future, Hellen plans to have a well-established business.

loans.use: to buy more clothes

loans.name: San Francisco Group

texts.es:
Para la formación del presente comité la inició la señora Constancia domiciliada en el Barrio San Francisco Britez Cue a 75 km de la oficina de Curuguaty.
El comité fue denominado “San Francisco” y actualmente está en el segundo ciclo, con 13 integrantes, su primer ciclo culminaron sin ningún inconveniente, es un grupo de señoras muy trabajadoras, ellas se dedican a diversas actividades tales como: venta chancho, nafta, queso, venta de comidas, despensa, etc.
Las  integrantes ya contaban con trabajo antes de formar parte del comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras y se integraron para lograr un mayor rendimiento en sus actividades.
Las mujeres manifestaron estar muy emocionadas por el apoyo de la Fundación Paraguaya por ser la empresa que confió en ellas y le dio la oportunidad de mejorar la calidad de vida de cada una de ellas a través de su trabajo, y poder desarrollar el trabajo en equipo.
La sra. Emilia se dedica a la venta de carne de chancho, ella compra cerdos y los engorda para luego poder faenarlos para la venta mayoritaria, pues de esto obtiene un buen margen de ganancia, lo cual la ayuda al fin de  mantener a su familia, superar la pobreza y brindar una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos especialmente.
texts.en:
Constancia, from the San Francisco Britez Cue neighborhood, 75 kilometers from the Curuguaty office, started this group.

The committee was named “San Francisco” and is now in its second loan cycle with 13 members.  
It completed its first cycle with no problems.  The committee is made up of hardworking women who are involved in different types of businesses such as: selling pork, gas, cheese, prepared food, packaged food, etc.  The members all were working before they started the committee of Entrepreneurial Women and they united to achieve more  from their businesses.

The women are thrilled by the support from the Fundación Paraguaya because it’s an organization that has confidence in them, and has given each one of them the opportunity to improve the quality of their lives through their work, and they have been able to develop their businesses as a team.

Emilia sells pork.  She buys the pigs, fattens them, and slaughters them to later sell the pork to a wholesaler.  That is how she gets good earnings which helps support her family and lifts them from poverty to offer a better standard of living, especially to her children.

loans.use: To buy pigs

loans.name: Rehema

texts.en: Rehema is 33 years old and married. Rehema runs a motor bike business in Mtwapa, Mombasa, which she has been doing for the past year. Rehema is a KADET client and this is her second loan. With this loan she plans to purchase spares parts to repair motor bikes. Rehema hopes to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and to maintain her family. Her dream is to become a successful business lady.

loans.use: to purchase spares parts to repair motor bikes.

loans.name: Lidivine

texts.en: lidivine is 35 years, married, and has five children. Her husband is a mechanic. Lidivine sells charcoal and has been doing so for the past eight years. With the income from her business, she can meet her family's needs and expand her business as well. She is requesting a loan to purchase more charcoal so she can increase her profits. With the profits she plans to expand her business and continue meeting her family's needs.

loans.use: to purchase more charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more clothes

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase more chickens to resell.

loans.name: Teoda

texts.en:
Teoda is 41 years old, a single mother of one child. Teoda offers photocopy and typing services in Ganjoni, Mombasa, a business that she has been doing for the last six years. She is also a retailer of photocopy and printing paper.

Teoda has been a KADET client and this marks her second loan to finance her business. With this loan she plans to purchase more paper for her store and also to renovate her store. 

Teoda hopes to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and to maintain her family. Her dream is to open another branch in future and to be able to support her family well.

loans.use: purchase more paper for her store and to also renovate her store.

loans.name: Victoire

texts.en:
Victoire is 45 years old. She has five children who are ages 7-22 years old. They are all in school. Her husband is a driver.

Victoire is a tailor. She has been a tailor for the past 28 years and her business is going on well. She also sells fabrics known as "ibitenge". Usually people buy these fabrics, explain to her which design they would like to have, then she makes them. She is very experienced and knows how to make different styles.

This business has always enabled her to provide for her family's need with the help of her husband. She is requesting a loan to buy more fabrics, expand her business and make more profit.

loans.use: to buy fabrics.

loans.name: Consessa

texts.en:
Consessa is 40 years old. Her husband is a technician. Consessa  owns a general store in which she sells different kinds of items commonly used at home such as sugar, salt, matches  and a few snacks. She has been running this shop for the past three years and her business is going on well. This business, together with her husband, has enabled her to educate and feed her family and meet all the needs of her business. 

She needs a loan to expand her business by buying more items and stocking enough to reduce transport expenses and hence make more profit. She plans to buy a few things needed for her family with the profit she hopes to make.

loans.use: to buy items such as sugar, salt, etc. to stock her store.

loans.name: San Cayetano Group

texts.es:
Para la formación del presente comité la inició la señora Josefina, domiciliada en el Barrio San Francisco Curuguaty.
El comité fue denominado “San Cayetano” y actualmente está en el segundo siclo, con 12 integrantes, algunas de las ingrantes son nuevas, todas ellas son muy trabajadoras.
El comité San Cayetano quedó muy conforme por el respaldo otorgado por la Fundacion Paraguaya.
La sra. Gloria se dedica a la venta de ropas, es una actividad sin mucha competencia hacia su zona pues la mayoría de las personas poseen como actividad principal la cría de animales y su posterior comercialización.
Ella empezó desde muy joven vendiendo medias y gorras, hoy día posee una buena cantidad de clientes y vende toda clase de prendas para hombres y mujeres, y también se adecua a la temporada en la que se encuentra ya sea verano o invierno.
Es una mujer que se esmera mucho para poder superarse, y solicita el crédito para la compra de más prendas como pantalones, abrigos, remeras, medias, etc. a fin de adquirirlos a cantidades mayoritarias y precios más económicos, así le quedaría un excelente y mayor margen de ganancia a la hora de venderlos.
texts.en:
Josefina who lives in the San Francisco Curuguaty neighborhood formed this committee.   It was called “San Cayetano” and it is currently in its second cycle with 12 members.  Some of the members are new; all the members are very hard working.  The San Cayetano committee was very satisfied with the support provided by Fundación Paraguaya.

Gloria sells clothes.  This is an activity with little competition in her area because most of the people are dedicated to raising animals for sale.  She started while still very young selling stockings and caps.  Today, she has a good number of customers and she sells all sorts of articles of clothing for men and women.  She also adjusts to the season she’s in be it summer or winter.

She is a woman who strives toward self improvement and is asking for this loan to buy more articles of clothing like pants, coats, t-shirts, stockings, etc. at wholesale amounts and at more economical prices so that her profit margin will be excellent and larger when she sells them.

loans.use: to buy pants, coats, t-shirts, stockings, etc.

loans.name: Koba

texts.en:
Koba comes from village Vardisubani, a small village in mountainous Kartli. He is 32 years old and lives with his wife Lela, their one-year-old son and his parents. Koba is a driver of a mini-bus which connects two towns in Kartli. Along with this job, Koba is involved in family farming. They grow potatoes, wheat, maize and haricot beans. Harvested produce is sold in his or nearby villages. Koba’s total average monthly income from both activities is 900 Laris.

Koba requested credit to purchase fertilizers and potato seeds. After fertilizing the plot of land, he will get a high quality harvest, which will be sold for a higher price and the income of the family will increase. Koba plans to use the profit for renovation of his house, as it is already old and needs renovation to be comfortable.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and potato seeds.

loans.name: Epiphanie

texts.en: Epiphanie is 42 years, and she has two children who are aged 17 and 19 years old. Her husband is a driver. She owns a restaurant in which she features several African dishes and a general store in which she sells various items such as sugar, salt etc. These businesses enable her to meet both her needs and her family's needs. She is requesting a loan to reinvest in her restaurant business by buying different kinds of foodstuffs. She plans to save all her profits.

loans.use: to buy different sorts of foodstuffs for her restaurant.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is 57 years old. She is married and has five children. She has been in quarry mining for the past 11 years.

She was introduced to KADET LTD by a KADET staff in her place of habitat. She has applied for her third loan, which she intends to use to employ more temporary workers in her quarry. She hopes to use the profit from the proceeds of this loan to expand her mining activity.


She dreams of educating her children to a higher level of education. She is a thorough woman who is determined to achieve her goals.

loans.use: to employ more temporary workers in her quarry

loans.name: Lillian

texts.en: Lillian is 24 years old and has a six-month-old baby. Her husband is a businessman. She owns a general store in which she sells different kinds of items such as biscuits, water, rice, cooking oil, etc. Lillian has always met the needs of her family with the help of her business. She is requesting a loan to buy more items such as cooking oil, rice, etc. to expand her business.  She enjoys her business. Lillian plans to save her business and open up another business one day.

loans.use: to buy cooking oil, rice, etc for her general store.

loans.name: Clementine

texts.en: Clementine is 38 years old. She has five children who are between 2-13 years old. They are all in school except for the youngest. Her husband does some construction work. Clementine sells vegetables including tomatoes, etc, other foodstuffs such as beans and sorghum together with other items such as biscuits, matches, and candles.  She has been doing this business for the past three years and her business is going well. This business has enabled her to meet the needs of her family and get herself out of poverty. She needs a loan to buy more foodstuffs so that her business is expanded and she makes more profits. She plans to expand her business with the profits she hopes to make.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs to sell

loans.name: San Blas Group

texts.es:
Para la formación el presente comité inicio la Señora Maria Cristina, domiciliada en la Compañia Tacuapi a 40km de la oficina de Curuguaty.
Para el nombre del comité escogieron “San Blas” y actualmente esta en el segundo siclo, con 10 integrantes, todas ellas son mujeres muy sacrificadas y solidarias entre sí, para poder salir adelante juntas.
La sra. Ramona posee un copetín, o kiosko, donde vende bebidas y toda clase de comestibles preparados por ella misma, pues cada día realiza varios tipos de comidas rápidas como empanadas, hamburguesas, croquetas, y demás, para poder venderlos a las personas que muchas veces no pueden regresar a sus casas para almorzar o desayunar, entonces ella se encarga pulcramente de realizar sus comestibles y venderlos.
Gracias a la calidad de sus productos posee muchos clientes, y desea mantener ese nivel, por ello solicita el crédito a fin de adquirir bebidas e insumos para la preparación de sus alimentos.
texts.en:
María Cristina who lives in the Tacuapi Compañía 40 kilometers from the Curuguaty office spearheaded the formation of this committee.  The committee chose the name “San Blas” and they are in the second cycle with 10 members.  All the women are very self-denying and mutually supportive in order to get ahead together.

Ramona has a snack bar or kiosk where she sells beverages and all kinds of dishes prepared by herself.  She prepares all sorts of fast food daily like turnovers, hamburgers, croquettes, and others to sell to people who often can’t return home to have lunch or breakfast so she takes care of very hygienically preparing their meals and sell them.  Thanks to the quality of her products she has many customers and she wants to stay at this level so she asks for a loan in order to acquire beverages and ingredients to prepare her food.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to prepare her food and to buy beverages.

loans.name: Maria Juana

texts.es:
María Juana tiene 33 años, es casada vive con el esposo y aun no tiene hijos vive en el Recinto Agua Clara Perteneciente al Cantón Chillanes.

Los miembros de la V.R.C VIRGEN DEL HUAYCO, esta conformada por 14 socios y se encuentra en el Recinto Loma de Guacalgoto a 20 minutos de la oficina en Chillanes, esta ventanilla se dedica a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz y frejol y algunos a la comercialización ya sea de harinas o de animales.

María  se dedica a la agricultura siembra de maíz y frejol y un poco comercializa harinas de trigo y maíz. Las compras las realiza en Chillanes y San Pablo y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

El crédito le ayudará en la compra de insumos para los cultivos, el crédito le apoyado de manera que han incrementado la producción de los cultivos. Ha enfrentado desafíos como plagas y enfermedades de los cultivos y la falta de un molino para procesar la harina. Su sueño es poder comprar una molino para procesar el maíz y sacar la harina.

Le gusta ser una persona muy alegre y festejar las fiesta del Recinto con la familia.
texts.en:
María Juana, 33, is married living with her husband.  She does not have any children yet.  She lives in Agua Clara belonging to Chillanes Canton.

The “Virgen del Huayco” communal bank has 14 members and is located in Loma de Guacalgoto 20 minutes from the Chillanes office.  The members of this communal bank are corn and bean farmers and some sell either flour or animals.

María is a corn and bean farmer and she sells small amounts of wheat flour and corn flour.  She makes her purchases in Chillanes and in San Pablo and her sales take place at the Chillanes Sunday farmers market.

The loan will help her buy farming supplies.  The loan has helped her increase crop yields.  She has faced such challenges as infestations and crop illnesses and the lack of a mill to process flour.  Her dream is to buy a mill to process the corn to make flour.  She enjoys being a cheerful person and celebrating the town’s festival with her family.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es: Daniel trabaja en las Fuerzas Armadas de Bolivia. El crédito los usará para la compra de Uniforme y equipo que necesita para continuar sus estudios. Vive en casa de sus padres en el barrio de Bolonia de la ciudad de La Paz. Es soltero y no tiene hijos. Esta es la primera vez que solicita un crédito.
texts.en: Daniel works in the Bolivian Armed Forces.  He will use the loan to buy his uniform and equipment he needs to continue with his studies.  He lives in his parents’ house in La Paz’s Bolonia neighborhood.  He’s single and does not have any children.  This is his first loan request.

loans.use: to buy his uniform and equipment to continue with his studies.

loans.name: Jeanne

texts.en: Jeanne is 31 years old with three children who are between 4-11 years old. Her husband is a driver .Jeanne sells fruits, vegetables (such as onions) and other items in her general store such as soap, biscuits and plastic products. She has done this business for the past four years. She has been able to send her children to school and meet their needs with the profits she gets from this business. She wishes to have a loan in order to reinvest in her business by buying more vegetables and fruits and make some profits. With the profits, she plans to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and fruits to sell

loans.name: Henry

texts.es: El señor Henry es empleado en una empresa en el sector de distribución. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de material de construcción  para la refacción de una habitación. Vive en casa de parientes ubicada en la zona de Las Lomas  de la ciudad de La Paz es casado y tiene un hijo. El cliente se encuentra muy satisfecho con los créditos que se le otorgaron anteriormente.
texts.en: Henry is employed by a firm in the distribution department.  He needs the loan to buy building materials and supplies to redo a room.  He lives in relatives’ house located in La Paz’s Las Lomas neighborhood.  He’s married and has a son.  He is very satisfied with his previously granted loans.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Fabian Geovany

texts.es:
Fabian Geovany tiene 30 años, es soltero vive con los padres, no tiene hijos vive en el Recinto Agua Clara Perteneciente al Cantón Chillanes.

Los miembros de la V.R.C VIRGEN DEL HUAYCO, esta conformada por 14 socios y se encuentra en el Recinto Loma de Guacalgoto a 20 minutos de la oficina en Chillanes, esta ventanilla se dedica a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz y frejol y algunos a la comercialización ya sea de harinas o de animales.

Fabian se dedica a la agricultura siembra de maíz y frejol. Las compras las realiza en Chillanes y San Pablo y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

El crédito le ayudará en la compra de insumos para los cultivos, el crédito le apoyado de manera que han incrementado la producción de los cultivos. Ha enfrentado desafíos como plagas y enfermedades de los cultivos. Su sueño es culminar la carrera profesional.

Le gusta ser una persona alegre, hacer deporte y festejar las fiestas del recinto.
texts.en:
Fabián Geovany, 30, is single living with his parents.  He does not have any children.  He lives in Agua Clara belonging to Chillanes Canton.

There are 14 members of the “Virgen del Huayco” communal bank located in Loma de Guacalgoto 20 minutes from the Chillanes office.  The members of this communal bank are corn and bean farmers and some sell flour or animals.

Fabián is a corn and bean farmer.  He makes his purchases in Chillanes and in San Pablo and his sales take place in the Chillanes Sunday farmers market.

The loan will help him buy farming supplies.  The loan has helped him increase crop yields.  The challenges he faces are infestations and crop illnesses.  His dream is to finish his professional career.  He likes being a cheerful person, to play sports and to celebrate the local festivals.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Zamiri Group

texts.fr: La cliente Masika, représentante du groupe d’affaire « Zamiri » est entrepreneur, âgée de 69 ans, veuve, grand mère de plusieurs petits fils et filles.  Elle est vendeuse de poissons frais et fumés au marché central de Virunga. Environs 30 ans qu’elle exerce cette activité. Cependant, elle vient de réaliser  17 cycles avec le crédit de Hekima dans la banque communautaire. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir  de s’approvisionner  avec  4 paniers de poissons et le reste d’argent  sera affecté dans les petits projets de la famille.  Elle est confortable de vivre en paix avec ses enfants et petits fils et filles. Ainsi donc, elle ambitionne  acheter une parcelle qu’elle léguera à sa descendance.  La cliente remercie Hekima pour  ses actions en faveur de pauvres femmes exclues de banque classique. Le groupe « Zamiri » reste caractériser par le travail et le succès dans les affaires.
texts.en: Masika, representative for the business group "Zamiri" is an entrepreneur, aged 69, a widow, and a grandmother of several boys and girls.  She sells fresh and smoked fish at the central market of Virunga. She has been in this business for about 30 years. She has just finished 17 rounds of loans with the banque communautaire Hekima. This new loan will help her stock up on four baskets of fish and the rest of the money will be used for small family projects. She lives comfortably in peace with her children and grandchildren. However, she has a goal to buy a small parcel of land that she can leave to her next of kin.  She thanks Hekima for its work with poor women who are excluded from the traditional banking industry. Zamiri group remains dedicated to its work and business success.

loans.use: to buy four baskets of fish

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: David

texts.es: El señor David trabaja como repartidor de productos lácteos, además en el transcurso de la semana trabaja como voceador de minibús, con los ingresos que obtiene cubre los gastos de su familia. El crédito lo requiere para la construcción de una habitación. Vive en casa de sus padres ubicada en la zona de Villa Bolívar “D”  de la ciudad de El Alto, es soltero y no tiene hijos. Es la primera vez que el cliente obtiene un crédito en IMPRO.
texts.en:
David works as a dairy products delivery person.  Also, during the week he works as a minibus newspaper salesman.  Income he earns covers family expenses. 

He needs the loan to build a room.  He lives in his parents’ house located in the city of El Alto’s Villa Bolívar “D” zone.  He’s single and has no children.  This is his first loan from IMPRO.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Alphonsine

texts.en: Alphonsine is 49 years old. She has three children who are 22 - 28 years old. She is a widow and she has not been able to educate her children; only the youngest completed primary school. She sells foodstuffs such as green bananas, beans and some fruits such as bananas. She has been doing this business for the past three years and her business is going well. This business has enabled her to feed her family and sustain her business as well. She is requesting a loan to reinvest in her business by buying more foodstuffs and fruits and hence make more profits. She hopes to send at least one of her children back to school.

loans.use: to buy more foodstuffs.

loans.name: Jiorgino

texts.es: El señor Jiorgino trabaja realizando botas para damas y entrega por mayor a minoristas para su respectiva comercialización. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de materia prima como ser: cuero, hebillas, hilos, etc. Vive en casa e alquiler con su señora madre ubicada en la zona de Tembladerani  en la ciudad de La Paz  es soltero y no tiene hijos. Esta es la primera vez que solicita un crédito a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Jiorgino works making boots for women that he sells wholesale to retailers for their subsequent resale.  He needs the loan to buy raw materials like: leather, buckles, thread, etc.  

He lives in a rented house with his mother in the city of La Paz’s Tembladerani zone.  He’s single and has no children.  This is his first loan request through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy boot-making supplies.

loans.name: Laurence

texts.en: Laurence is 34 years old with two children who are ages eight and twelve years old. Her husband is a technician. She sells foodstuffs such as beans and sorghum and she has been selling these foodstuffs for the past three years. This business helps her support her children in all aspects of life including school, feeding, etc. She is requesting a loan to buy more foodstuffs and hence make more profits. She plans to expand her business with the profits she hopes to make.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs to sell

loans.name: Fausto

texts.es: El señor Fausto de dedica a  la venta de toros y su esposa vende papa al por menor el las ferias de la ciudad de El Alto. El crédito lo requiere para  el aumento de capital de su esposa y así ella podrá adquirir mayor cantidad de papa y de diferentes variedades. Viven en alquiler en la zona 16 de Julio de la ciudad de El Alto; Fausto es casado y tiene tres hijos.
texts.en: Fausto is married and has 3 children. Fausto sells bulls and his wife sells small quantities of potatoes in the markets of the city of El Alto. He needs the loan to increase his wife's capital so that she will be able to buy greater quantities of potatoes and different varieties. They live in a rented home in the 16 de Julio zone in the city of El Alto.

loans.use: to buy greater quantities and varieties of potatoes so that his wife can sell them in the markets of El Alto.

loans.name: Claudine

texts.en: Claudine is 25 years old and has three children who are ages 8-3 years old. Her husband is a house builder. She owns and runs a restaurant in which she sells different African dishes, tea and soft drinks. The profits from this business have enabled her to expand her business and meet the needs of her family. She is requesting a loan to buy more foodstuffs and make more profit. She plans to expand her business with the profits she hopes to make.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs to serve in her restaurant

loans.name: Santos Epifanio

texts.es: Santos Epifanio tiene 43 años, su actividad económica es la venta de mercadería en general. Tiene más de 5 años, en este tipo de negocio, inicio con un dinero que le habían prestado pues a pesar de que no era mucho capital compro ciertos productos fue así que ha logrado hacerse poco a poco de su propio negocio, es una persona muy responsable y disfruta de proporcionarle a sus 3 hijos los ingresos necesarios. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, vestidos, trajes, camisas entre otros.
texts.en: Santos Epifano, 43, sells general merchandise. He has been doing this for more than 5 years. He started with money from a loan, and in spite of the fact that he didn't have much capital he bought certain products and little by little has made his own business.  He is very responsible and enjoys giving his 3 children the money they need. The requested loan is for the purchase of pants, shirts, skirts, dresses, suits and blouses, among other things.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, skirts, dresses, suits and blouses, among other things

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan tiene  23 años de edad, vive con su esposa y sus dos hijas.  él cuenta con casa propia, la cual está ubicada en una zona rural del distrito de Monsefú  a 20 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo   donde cuenta con energía eléctrica y agua de pozo.

Juan se dedica a prestar servicios de transporte publico en su unidad móvil que es una mototaxi (moto con cabina para transportar persona) la cual es propia, el cuenta con experiencia de mas de 5 años dedicándose a este oficio y esta actividad la realiza en los pueblos de Reque y Monsefú. 

Juan está solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para que con este dinero el pueda un pozo tubular (pozo de donde se extrae agua del subsuelo) el cual lo necesita.

Juan  es una persona muy trabajadora y honrada, bastante conocida y estimada por los pobladores de la zona en donde reside. Las personas que le conocen la consideran tranquilo y bastante responsable.
texts.en:
Juan is 23 years old and lives with his wife and 2 daughters in his own house, located in a rural zone of the district of Monsefu, some 20 minutes from the city of Chiclayo. He has access to electricity and well water.

Juan offers public transportation services in a mobile unit,  a 'mototaxi' (a motorcycle with a cabin for transporting people) which he owns. He has more than 5 years experience in this occupation which he practices in the towns of Reque and Monsefu.

Juan is requesting a loan through Edpyme Alternativa for 2,000 new sols so that he can install a tubular well (one that can extract water from the subsoil), which he needs.

Juan is a very hard-working and honorable person, well known and respected by the people of the zone where he lives. Those who know him consider him calm and quite responsible.

loans.use: to drill a tubular water well which his family needs.

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es:
Rosa Elvira tiene 26 años, es soltera vive con los padres no tiene hijos vive en el Recinto Agua Clara Perteneciente al Cantón Chillanes.

Los miembros de la V.R.C VIRGEN DEL HUAYCO, esta conformada por 14 socios y se encuentra en el Recinto Loma de Guacalgoto a 20 minutos de la oficina en Chillanes, esta ventanilla se dedica a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz y frejol y algunos a la comercialización ya sea de harinas o de animales.

Rosa se dedica a la agricultura siembra de maíz y frejol.  Las compras las realiza en Chillanes y San Pablo y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

El crédito le ayudará en la compra de insumos para los cultivos, el crédito le apoyado de manera que han incrementado la producción de los cultivos. Ha enfrentado desafíos como plagas y enfermedades de los cultivos y los intermediarios. Su sueño es tener casa propia.

Le gusta ser una persona emprendedora escuchar muisica y bailar en las fiestas.
texts.en:
Rosa Elvira is 26, single, doesn't have children and lives with her parents in the Agua Clara region of Chillanes canton.

The lending club Virgen del Huayco is made up of 14 members and is found in the region of Loma de Guacalgoto, 20 minutes from the office in Chillanes. The members of this group work in agriculture, cultivating corn and beans; others are in sales of flour or animals.

Rosa plants corn and beans. She makes purchases in Chillanes and San Pablo and sells them in the Sunday markets in Chillanes. 

The loan will help her to buy inputs for the crops. The loan has helped her increase her crop production. She has faced challenges like pests and crop diseases. Her dream is to have her own home.

She likes to be a go-getter, and listen to music and dance at parties.

loans.use: to buy inputs for the crops.

loans.name: Garcelis William

texts.es:
Garcelis tiene  31 años de edad, ella vive con su esposa y con sus 2 hijos, el cuenta con casa propia, la cual está ubicada en una zona rural en un caserío Pedregal Bajo en el distrito de Tambogrande en el departamento de Piura.

Garcelis se dedica a la venta de pescado la cual la realiza todos los días recorriendo en la zona donde vive donde tiene clientela conocida,  además vende en su domicilio, ya que para este negocio cuenta con varios años de experiencia. Su esposa lo ayuda criando y vendiendo aves de corral .ambos se apoyan para seguir adelante existe una buena relación familiar, para seguir creciendo en su negocio

Garcelis está solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para que pueda comprar pescado y de esta manera pueda atender a sus cliente y así logra incrementar los ventas lo cual le permitirá mejores ingresos para su hogar.

Garcelis es una persona tranquila y bastante entregada a su familia. Las personas que le conocen le consideran una persona emprendedora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante.
texts.en:
Garcelis is 31 years old. He lives with his wife and children. He has his own house. It is located in a rural area called Pedregal Bajo, in the Tambogrande district located in the Piura department. 

Garcelis sells fish which he gets every day in the area around where he lives. He has a regular customers and he sells his products from his home. He now has had several years of experience with his business. His wife helps to raise and sell poultry. They support each other in order to make progress. They have a good relationship and they can continue growing their business. 

Garcelis is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 1000 Nuevos Soles to buy fish. This way he can serve his customers and increase his sales and earn a better income for his home. 

Garcelis is a calm person and he is quite dedicated to his family. The people who know him consider him to be an entrepreneurial person who wants to move forward.

loans.use: buy fish in large quantities in order to increase his profit margin

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es:
Luis es un padre de familia que tiene  36 años de edad, el vive en casa de sus padres junto a su esposa y su menor hijo, tal vivienda está ubicada en el distrito de Illimo, en la parte Rural de este distrito y aún así cuenta con los servicios básicos.

Luis se desenvuelve brindado servicios de controlador de Empresa de Transportes. Esta actividad que le permite sobrevivir la viene realizando hace varios años. Su actividad consiste en controlar el tiempo de llegada y salida de las los autos que pertenecen ala empresa donde trabaja así como el tiempo que demoran en hacer su recorrido.

Luis esta solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para que pueda hacer mejoras dentro de su vivienda, de esta manera el pueda contar con mayor seguridad y comodidad dentro de su vivienda. 

Luis es un hombre responsable y trabajador que con esfuerzo desea salir  adelante con su familia y que poco apoco obtengan una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
Luis is a father who is 36 years old. He lives in his parents' house together with his wife and child. The house is located in the district of Illimo. It is in a rural area of this district, but it does have basic utility services. 

Luis works providing administrative services for a transportation company. He has done this work, which allows him to earn a living, for several years. His work consists of recording the arrival and departure times of the vehicles belonging to the company where he works, as well as the time they take to complete their journeys. 

Luis is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 1000 Peruvian new soles, so that he can make improvements inside his house. In this way, he will have better security and comfort within his home. 

Luis is a responsible and hard-working man who wants to help his family get ahead through his efforts and achieve little by little a better quality of life.

loans.use: to make improvements to his house.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es: La señora Teodora fabrica maquinas quemadores de sellos, productos que comercializa en los departamentos de Cobija , Beni y Santa Cruz; su esposo es el encargado de venderlos. El crédito lo requiere para comprar material como ser: goma, laminas de metal, y sellador especial. Vive en casa de sus padres ubicada en la zona de San José de Yunguyo de la ciudad de La Paz; es casado  y tiene tres hijos.
texts.en: Teodora is married and has 3 children. She makes machines that burn seals, which are sold in the departments of Cobija, Beni and Santa Cruz. Her husband is in charge of the sales. The loan is needed to buy materials like rubber, sheets of metal and special sealant. She lives in her parents' house in the zone of San Jose de Yunguyo in the city of La Paz.

loans.use: to buy rubber, sheets of metal and special sealants for her business making stamps.

loans.name: Glenda Maria

texts.es:
Glenda, vive con su madre y dos hijos, es comerciante D. especias, platos, velas, carteras y golosinas, este negocio tiene más D. 20 años D. existir, ya que sus padres dieron inicio hace mucho tiempo, tiene un puesto en el mercado municipal donD. ofrece esta mercadería.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para compra más especias, platos y boquitas, variando así el negocio y ofreciendo mayor cantidad a los clientes, para generar más ventas.
El objetivo D. ella es tener surtido el negocio, realizar buenas inversiones que le ayuden a crecer más competente, y proveer para sus hijos todo lo necesario para su desarrollo.
texts.en:
Glenda lives with her mother and two children. She sells spices, plates, candles, wallets and snacks. This business has been around for more than 20 years; her parents started it many years ago. She has a stall in the municipal market where she offers this merchandise.

Currently she asks for a loan to buy more spices, plates and snacks, to add variety to her business and offer greater quantity to her clients so generate more sales.

Her goal is to stock her business, make good investments that help her to become more competent and to give her kids everything they need for development.

loans.use: to buy more spices, plates and snacks.

loans.name: Liliana

texts.es:
Liliana es una madre de familia que tiene 32 años de edad, ella tiene 02 hijos a su cargo. Vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus hijos, dicha casa está ubicada en el Caserío Charan Coposo en el distrito de Tambogrande en el departamento de Piura, Liliana vive en una zona rural del distrito, pero cuenta con servicio de luz.

Liliana se dedica ala crianza y comercialización de animales menores como ganado ovino (ovejas) y para esta a actividad cuenta con una experiencia de 5 años, para ello ella ha construido corrales apropiados y espaciosos para una mejor crianza de sus animales. Los animales cuando alcanzan tamaño y peso ideal los comercializa en el mercado local.

Liliana está solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles con los que comprará animales pequeños para su cría, asi como tambien alimento balanceado para su ganado ovino,de está manera obtendrá un mejor desarrollo y los podrá vender aun mejor precio

Liliana es una persona bastante conocida y estimada por los pobladores de la zona en donde reside. Las personas que la conocen la consideran alguien tranquila y bastante responsable.
texts.en:
Liliana is a 32-year-old mother with 2 children in her care. She lives in her own house with her husband and children. The house is located in the Charan Coposo neighborhood in the district of Tambogrande, in the department of Piura. Liliana lives in a rural area of the district, but she has electricity services. 

Liliana works raising and selling small livestock such as sheep, and she has 5 years of experience with this work. For this purpose, she has constructed appropriate and spacious pens to raise her animals more effectively. When the animals reach the ideal size and weight, she sells them at the local market. 

Liliana is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 1000 Peruvian new soles, which she will use to buy small livestock to raise, as well as balanced feed for her sheep. In this way, she will achieve better development and will be able to sell them for a better price. 

Liliana is a person who is very well-known and respected by the inhabitants of the area where she lives. The people who know her consider her a good-natured and very responsible person.

loans.use: to buy small livestock to raise, as well as the appropriate animal feed.

loans.name: Virgen Del Rosario Group

texts.es:
El comité “Virgen del Rosario", se conformó con la iniciativa de la señora Martina; actualmente se encuentran  en el segundo ciclo, con quince (15) integrantes.
Culminaron el primer ciclo sin inconvenientes, han demostrado unión y solidaridad entre las compañeras; en el ciclo actual se incorporan dos nuevas integrantes, quienes poseen actividad económica y son muy trabajadoras.
La sra. Martina se dedica a la producción y venta de mandioca, es un producto típico de Paraguay, muy consumido en el país en sustitución del panificado, e incluso es mucho más solicitado que los panes por su sabor y accesibilidad económica.
Ella ha aprovechado estas cualidades para poder hacer crecer su negocio, vendiendo a los almacenes y personas que deseen consumirlo sin necesidad de poseer un negocio.
Martina desea poder aumentar sus ingresos aumentando sus producciones y solicita el crédito para la compra de abono y fertilizantes.
texts.en:
The club "Virgen del Rosario" was formed at the initiative of Martina. Currently they are in their second cycle and have 15 members.

They finished the first cycle without problems, and have demonstrated unity and solidarity among the members. During the current cycle two new hardworking women with businesses will be incorporated into the group.

Martina grows and sells mandioca [cassava], a product typical to Paraguay and consumed throughout the country in place of bread. It is much more popular than bread because of its flavor and low cost.

She has taken advantage of these qualities to grow her business, selling to the large stores and to people who want to eat it without needing to have a business.

Martina wants to increase her income by increasing her production, and asks for a loan to buy compost and fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizer to increase crop production.

loans.name: Claribet

texts.es:
Claribet forma parte del banco comunal “Eben Ezer” perteneciente a la comuna de Puente Alto, ciudad de Santiago.
Ella se dedica a vender frutas en la feria desde hace 14 años, su mercadería la compra en la vega (feria libre de frutas, verduras y abarrotes) destinada a comerciantes que compran al por mayor. 
Trabaja los días martes a domingo, en ferias libres cercanas a su domicilio, su clientela es frecuente y conserva algunos clientes antiguos. Comenta que su local está muy bien organizado, inclusive las frutas las ordena por colores y que sus frutas son de primera calidad,  razón por la cual tiene bastante clientela.
Con el crédito comprará frutas.
Sus metas son comprarse una camioneta, ya que la que utiliza para trasladar su mercadería es muy antigua del año 1968 y además quiere comprar un puesto de feria armable, consistente en fierros, lonas y plástico. 
Claribet vive junto a sus dos hijas de 26 y 30 años, además disfruta de la compañía de de sus 3 nietos de 11 y 3 años de edad y un bebé de 5 meses de edad. 
Claribet viene de una familia de comerciantes, por lo tanto disfruta mucho el rubro que realiza.
Sus motivaciones de continuar con el negocio se deben a los ingresos que recibe, lo que le permitirá brindarle a su familia una estabilidad socioeconómica, especialmente a sus nietos. 
Claribet está muy contenta y agradecida del apoyo brindado por Fondo Esperanza desde el crédito, hasta las capacitaciones impartidas en las reuniones del grupo del banco comunal, estos aprendizajes le han servido en su negocio para registrar sus gastos e ingresos
Desde su experiencia en las reuniones éstas han sido muy gratas, ya que se distrae, comparte con las demás socias, quienes la han acogido muy bien. 
Puente Alto es una comuna ubicada al norte de Santiago, capital de Chile. Fue fundada como un pequeño pueblo rural a fines del siglo XIX, pero dado su crecimiento demográfico es actualmente una de las comunas con mayor población de Chile, superando los 600 mil habitantes. Es la puerta de entrada a uno de los sectores precordilleranos de la región Metropolitana, conocido como el Cajón del Maipo, sector con espacios de caminatas, cabalgatas, rafting, entre otras actividades y servicios de alojamiento y alimentación.
texts.en:
Claribet is a member of the Eben Ezer community bank in Puente Alto, a suburb of Santiago.  
She has operated a produce business for 14 years.  She buys from the wholesale market at La Vega (a fruit, vegetable and grocery market).  She works near her house from Tuesdays to Sundays.  Her customers are passers-by but she has some long-standing customers, too.  She says that her shop is very well organized and that she even stocks her fruits by color.   Customers flock to her store because she stocks the best.  
Claribet will use this loan to buy fruit for her store.  She wants to buy a new delivery truck because hers is a 1968 model.  She also wants to buy a temporary stand that she can break down and move for market days.  
Claribet lives with two daughters, 26- and 30-years old, respectively.  She also has 3 grandchildren who range in age from 11-years old to just 5-months.  She comes from a family of retailers and she enjoys the work.  She likes the money she makes, too, because her income from the business supports her grandchildren and the rest of her family.  
Claribet is grateful for the support she's received from Fondo Esperanza, the loans they've extended, of course, but also the free training they provide at group meetings.  The meetings are fun and she likes sharing ideas with the other members of the group with whom she gets along well.  
Puente Alto is just north of Santiago, Chile's capital.  It was a small rural town at the end of the 19th century, but it has grown to be one of the largest towns in Chile, with a population of more than 600,000 people.  It's in the foothills that lie within the metropolitan area, an area known as Cajon del Maipo and famous for hiking, rafting and other outdoor activities.  It's know, too, for its restaurants and hotels.

loans.use: to buy fruit for her produce business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer and feed for his animals.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es: Maribel es natural de Huancayo, tiene 27 años y es madre soltera que vive con su madre y su pequeña hija en casa de un familiar. A lo largo de su vida aprendió a realizar los bordados de fustanes ya que es una actividad muy cotidiana en su zona y desde hace 3 años decidió realizar este trabajo en bordados artesanales. Es así que en su misma casa ha implementado un espacio convirtiéndolo en taller, abasteciéndolo de herramientas, como: caballetes y bastidores. Su jornada empieza generalmente por las mañanas y por las tardes se dedica a cuidar de su hija. Disfruta de su trabajo porque se considera una persona muy creativa, ya que aplica novedosos diseños y colores para que sus bordados sean atractivos ante sus clientes; además que lo realiza a mano y eso le da un mayor valor agregado a sus trabajo y por ende es mejor pagado. es su primera solicitud de crédito en MFP y fue por medio de la invitación de una amiga que la animó a formar parte  de su grupo solidario. Con este monto de dinero comprará hilos de diversos colores por conos y telas al por mayor de los colores de temporada.
texts.en:
Maribel, 27, is from Huancayo.  She is a single mother living with her mother and small daughter in a relative’s house.  All along her life she’s learned to make the embroidery on “fustanes” (traditional skirts or petticoats) since this is a very commonplace activity in her area.  

Three years ago she decided to work doing this artisanal embroidery.  She has, therefore, set aside space in her house for a workshop that she’s equipped with tools like: sawhorses and embroidery frames.  Her work period is usually in the morning and she spends the afternoon taking care of her daughter.  She enjoys her work because she considers herself a very creative person for she applies novel designs and colors so that her embroidery will be attractive to her customers.  Besides, being done by hand adds value to her work and it’s thus better paid.

This is her first loan request at MFP; a girl friend invited her and encouraged her to become part of a communal bank.  She will use this amount of money to buy cones of thread in assorted colors and fabric in at wholesale in seasonal colors.

loans.use: to buy thread in assorted colors and bolts of fabric.

loans.name: Griselda Marisol

texts.es:
Griselda, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, administra una tienda de productos domésticos, también vende meriendas, pescado, queso y tortillas, inicio con el negocio por influencia de sus vecinos, desde hace 10 años, hasta el momento no ha tenido dificultades y ha logrado mantenerse.
Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar mercadería para surtir el negocio, adquiriendo productos, como frijoles, arroz, pastas, pan, huevos, bebidas, maíz, carnes, embutidos, con estos podrá abastecer la tienda y de los mismos poder producir meriendas y tortillas.
El objetivo de ella es realizar una buena compra con el préstamo, para ser más competente y tener una mayor posibilidad de generar mayores ventas  a los clientes.
texts.en:
Griselda lives with her husband and her children. She runs a general store where she also sells light meals, fish, cheese and tortillas. She started her activity 10 years ago following her neighbors’ advice, and up to now she has not meet with any difficulties and has succeeded in providing for herself.
She is requesting a loan to buy products for her shop such as beans, rice, pastas, bread, eggs, drinks, maize, meat and sausages: this will help her supplying her shop with products she will also use to produce light meals and tortillas.
Her goal is to buy good products thanks to the loan, in order to become a better competitor and to have a better chance to sell more products to her customers.

loans.use: To buy beans, rice, pastas, bread, eggs, drinks, maize, meat and sausages.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es:
Alejandro tiene 56 años de edad, el cuenta con casa propia la cual está ubicada en el caserío Huaca blanca Distrito de Tambogrande, caserío mediano con deseos de superación.

Alejandro se dedica a la elaboración de y venta de chicha (bebida oriunda del Perú, elaborada en base a maíz y jora), así como también la venta de cerveza realizando sus ventas los días de fin de semana y los otros días desde su propio domicilio, hace mas de 8 años lleva en esta actividad, donde tiene clientela conocida en la zona, existe una buena relación familiar. 

 Alejandro está solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles  para la compra de cerveza e insumos para comenzar a preparar comidas para laventa, así poder incrementar sus ventas semanales, atender en menor tiempo a sus clientes y de esta manera seguir creciendo en su negocio.

Alejandro es una persona empeñosa y trabajadora, que desea salir adelante, con esfuerzo por eso desea que su negocio crezca y se pueda hacer mas conocido en la zona, para que pueda obtener mayores ingresos y de esta manera obtenga una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Alejandro is 56 years old.  He owns his own home, located in the hamlet of Huaca Blanca, district of Tambogrande, an ordinary hamlet with a desire to stand-out.

Alejandro makes and sells chicha (a native Peruvian drink prepared with corn and jora- a type of corn).  He also sells beer.  He sells his products on weekends and other days of the week from his home.  He has been engaged in this business for 8 years. He is known by the customers in the area and has a good relationship with them.   

Alejandro is requesting this loan of 1000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy beer and supplies to start preparing food for sale.  In this way, he will be able to increase his weekly sales, serve his customers in less time, and so continue to increase his business.

Alejandro is a tenacious and hard-working person who is willing to make the effort to get ahead. For this reason, he wants his business to grow and become known in the area so that he will earn greater income and, in this way, attain a better quality of life.
.

loans.use: to purchase supplies and beer in bulk in order to start a food sales business.

loans.name: Elmer Eduardo

texts.es:
Elmer  tiene 29  años de edad, el es soltero y  vive en casa de sus padres, no tiene carga familiar, su  vivienda está ubicada en el distrito de José Leonardo Ortiz a pocos minutos dela ciudad de Chiclayo en una  comunidad es urbana en vías de crecimiento cuenta con luz y agua propia.

Elmer se dedica a ofrecer sus servicios como maestro construcción oficio en cual lleva aproximadamente 02 años de experiencia en dicho servicio, razón por la cual se genera ingresos semanales, Elmer posee 01 trompo (mezcladora), cisayas,  01 taladro y demás herramientas, que le facilitan su trabajo.

Actualmente Elmer esta solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3000 nuevos soles para invertir en la compra de madera y andamios puesto que posee mayor demanda de obras.

Elmer es una conocido por su trabajo y por su esfuerzo que desea salir adelante y apoyar a sus  padres en todo lo que el pueda.
texts.en:
Elmer is 29 years old.  He is unmarried and lives at home with his parents.   He has no family responsibilities.  His home is located in the district of José Leonardo Ortiz, a few minutes from the city of Chiclayo.  It is a growing urban community and has its own water and electricity.  

Elmer is a professional in the construction field.  He has approximately two years of experience in this field and this enables him to generate weekly income.  Elmer has one spinning top (cement mixer), wire cutters, a drill, and other tools that facilitate his work.

Since his work is in higher demand, Elmer is currently applying for a loan of 3000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to invest in the purchase of wood and scaffolds. 
Elmer is known for his work and his effort.  He wants to get ahead and support his parents any way he can.

loans.use: to purchase wood and scaffolding

loans.name: Eva

texts.es:
Eva, administra una tienda de productos domésticos, vive en su propia casa con sus dos hijos, la tienda la administra desde hace 5 años, ella tiene mucha experiencia en el negocio pues desde hace muchos años viene dedicándose al negocio.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos domésticos, como bebidas, papel higiénico, jabón, detergentes, azúcar, sal, y otros más productos que son necesarios para la venta.
Su objetivo es aumentar el crecimiento del negocio, a través de financiamientos que le permitan lograr sus objetivos, también quiere garantizarle a sus hijos una mejor condición económica.
texts.en:
Eva runs a general store. She lives in her own house with her two children, and she has been running her shop for 5 years, and thanks to the years she has been working in her shop she has gained considerable experience in this activity.
The loan she is currently requesting will be used to buy everyday products such as drinks, toilet paper, soap, detergents, sugar, salt and other products she needs in the shop. 
She hopes to improve the growth rate of her activity through funds that will help her achieving her goals; she also wishes to grant her children better living conditions.

loans.use: To buy drinks, toilet paper, soap, detergents, sugar and salt.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials for making clothing and for the maintenance of his machinery.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more fabric and also to buy ingredients to make food.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make some improvements to her animal pens, and to buy more animals and animal feed

loans.name: Lucia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Lucia, vive con sus nietos y una hija de 23 años de edad, administra un negocio de productos domésticos, tiene 4 años de estar dedicado al negocio, su puesto está ubicado en el mercado municipal.
Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar mercadería y surtir el negocio, adquiriendo huevos, pan, frijoles, arroz, café, maíz, y demás productos que son necesarios para mantener la clientela satisfecha.
Su objetivo es aumentar las ganancias del negocio, a través de inversiones en productos demandados y que le ayuden a mantener la preferencia de los clientes.
texts.en:
Lucia lives with her grandchildren and a 23-year-old daughter.  She has a domestic products business which she has been running for four years.  Her stall is in the municipal market.

She is requesting a loan to buy goods such as eggs, bread, beans, rice, coffee, corn and other products to keep her customers satisfied.

Her goal is to increase earnings by stocking the products that are in highest demand for customer loyalty purposes.

loans.use: To buy eggs, bread, beans, rice, coffee and corn.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
Ana tiene 61 años D. edad que resiD. en casa D. sus padres con sus hermanos y un sobrino en un sector del distrito D. Reque. Un distrito a 20 minutos D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo situado en la provincia D. Lambayeque.

Ana se dedica a trabajar en labores asociadas a la agricultura desD. que era más joven. Por un lado cría animales menores, especialmente ganado vacuno y ovino, en algunos corrales situados cerca a su domicilio. Ella los alimenta D. granos y pastos naturales, cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel D. desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que frecuentemente visitan la zona en donD. resiD.. Adicionalmente percibe ingresos D. la venta D. leche.

Ella desea adquirir más animales menores y alimento balanceado para ampliar su negocio y percibir mayores ingresos, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Ana es una persona muy alegre, bastante empeñosa y trabajadora, su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresaria para poder mejorar su calidad D. vida.
texts.en:
Ana is 61 years old and lives in the home of her parents with her siblings and a nephew.  They resides in a section of the District of Reque, which is 20 minutes away from the city of Chiclayo in Lambayeque Province.  

Ana has been engaged in farm work since she was a young girl.  In addition, she raises animals such as cows and sheep.  The animals are kept in corrals near her home and their diet consists of grains and natural grasses.  When the animals have reached the proper stage of development, she offers them for sale to the traders who frequently visit the area where she lives.  In addition, she earns income by selling milk.  

Ana wants to acquire more animals and balanced feed so that she can expand her business and generate more income.  For this reason she is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 500 PEN so that she can accomplish her goal.  

Ana is a cheerful, earnest, and hardworking person.  Her greatest wish is to continue growing as an entrepreneur so that she can improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to acquire more animals and the appropriate feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chicken feed

loans.name: And Bokk Jom Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité And Bokk Jom est créé le 10 décembre 2010 . Il est au cycle 2 et est composé de quatorze femmes issues du même quartier.

Madame Nogaye est mariée sans enfant. Elle est âgée de 37 ans, elle est la responsable du groupe et s'active dans la transformation des fruits et légumes. Elle est debout à droite sur la photo habillée en rose blanche.

Elle s’approvisionne dans les marchés hebdomadaires et revend dans le village; elle a une bonne expérience et a bénéficié d'une formation pour cette activité de transformation.

Elle souhaite avec son prêt agrandir son activité pour se faire beaucoup de clients et de revenus.

Elle contribue avec ses bénéfices à améliorer les conditions de vie par la nourriture,l'habillement et la santé; aussi elle compte augmenter son épargne pour prétendre à un autre prêt plus élevé.
texts.en:
The solidarity group "And Bokk Jom" was created on September 10, 2010. It is on cycle 2, and it is composed of 14 women from the same district. 

Ms. Nogaye, aged 37, is married and without children. She is the group's official and is active in processing fruit and vegetables. In the photo, she is standing at the right and dressed in white and pink. She gets her supplies from the weekly markets and resells in the village; she has good experience and has benefited from training in this food processing activity. 

She would like to use her loan to expand her business, so as to have a lot of customers and profits.  With the profits, she is helping to improve living conditions, in terms of food, clothing, and health care; she also plans on increasing her savings to apply for another, larger loan.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables to process into products to be sold

loans.name: Magno Dioulacolon Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe a été créé le 14 Décembre 2010. Il compte 29 femmes qui habitent toutes le même village. Elles  font toutes le petit commerce.

Goundo (debout à l’extrême droit)  est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 46 ans, veuve et mère de 02 enfants.

Elle gère un « Tangana » place  où on vend le petit déjeuner dans son village activité qu’elle pratique depuis trois ans

Son nouveau prêt lui permettra d’acheter des sacs de niébé, des paquets de spaghettis et autres produits pour le bon fonctionnement de son activité.

Les bénéfices lui permettront en plus d’épargner, d’assurer la scolarité de ses enfants
texts.en: This group was created on December 14, 2010. It comprises 29 women who all live in the same village. They all have small businesses. Goundo (standing at the far right) is the group's official. She is 46 years old, a widow, and the mother of two children. She runs a tangana, where breakfasts are sold in the village. She has had this business for three years. Her new loan will enable her to buy sacks of black-eyed peas, packets of spaghetti, and other products for her business to operate properly. The profits will allow her make sure her children are educated, as well as to save money.

loans.use: to buy sacks of black-eyed peas, packets of spaghetti, and other products for the proper operation of her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To sodas, sweets, softdrinks and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Arcenio

texts.es:
El señor Arcenio es de nacionalidad paraguaya, soltero, con 24 años de edad, reside en una casa de alquiler en la ciudad de Curuguaty, en donde tiene su taller denominado "Taller de motos Rubinho", que está ubicado en el barrio Centro, en la direccion calle Eusebio Ayala, al lado del Super Tigre.
Trabajó en la firma Taller de motos R.D. por 5 años, donde ganó todas las experiencias que hoy los pone en práctica actualmente en su propio taller de motos. Comenzó su taller con la ayuda de sus padres en el año 2009 en el mismo local donde se encuentra actualmente.
Tiene experiencia de 7 años en el ramo, cuenta con clientela formada, un local bastante concurrido por la ubicación que posee, bastante transitado, está ubicado en dirección del Banco Nacional de Fomento y varias firmas Comerciales muy concurridas, que lo favorecen.
texts.en:
